data.title: Delta Air Lines Presents: Jimmy Carter 100: A Celebration in Song
data.meta_description: Join us for Delta Airlines Presents: Jimmy Carter 100: A Celebration in Song.Tickets at foxtheatre.org and 855-285-8499.
data.text: Join us for a 100th birthday tribute to former U.S. President Jimmy Carter, featuring an array of musicians as diverse as the music he loves. Pop, rock, gospel, country, jazz, hip-hop, and classical artists will gather on stage for a night of music that unites and inspires. Performers include Chuck Leavell, D-Nice, Drive-By Truckers, Eric Church, GROUPLOVE, Maren Morris, The War And Treaty, and the Atlanta Symphony Orchestra Chamber Chorus — with more artists being added weekly. Expect appearances from famous friends and dignitaries who love Jimmy and Rosalynn Carter and the organization they founded more than 40 years ago: The Carter Center. As President Carter once said, “Music is the best proof that people have one thing in common no matter where they live, no matter what language they speak.” Don’t miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to honor one of the world’s greatest leaders and humanitarians!
